languages.text: "Простор в опасности, и я хочу использовать десятину, чтобы защитить весь сектор. Разве Империум собирает подать не для того, чтобы Человечество выжило и двигалось к процветанию?"
"The Expanse is in danger. I want to use the tithe to protect the entire sector. Does the Imperium not exact tribute precisely so that Humanity may survive and advance toward prosperity?"
languages.original_text: "Простор в опасности, и я хочу использовать десятину, чтобы защитить весь сектор. Разве Империум собирает подать не для того, чтобы Человечество выжило и двигалось к процветанию?"

traits.locale_text: "The Expanse is in danger and I want to use the tithe to protect the entire sector. Does the Imperium not exact tribute so that Humanity can survive and advance toward prosperity?"
"The Expanse is in danger and I want to use the tithe to protect the entire sector. Does the Imperium not exact tribute so that Humanity can survive and advance toward prosperity?"
"The Expanse is in danger. I want to use the tithe to protect the entire sector. Does the Imperium not exact tribute precisely so that Humanity may survive and advance toward prosperity?"
"The Expanse is in danger. I want to use the tithe to protect the entire sector. Does the Imperium not exact tribute precisely so that Humanity may survive and advance toward prosperity?"
"The Expanse is in danger. I want to use the tithe to protect the entire sector. Does the Imperium not exact tribute precisely so that Humanity may survive and advance toward prosperity?"
"The Expanse is in danger. I want to use the tithe to protect the entire sector. Does the Imperium not exact tribute precisely so that Humanity may survive and advance toward prosperity?"

languages.text: "Die Ausdehnung ist in Gefahr. Ich will den Zehnt benutzen, um den gesamten Sektor zu schützen. Erhebt das Imperium den Tribut nicht exakt aus diesem Grund? Damit die Menschheit überleben und Wohlstand erlangen kann?"
languages.original_text: "The Expanse is in danger. I want to use the tithe to protect the entire sector. Does the Imperium not exact tribute precisely so that Humanity may survive and advance toward prosperity?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Ausdehnung ist in Gefahr. Ich will den Zehnt benutzen, um den gesamten Sektor zu schützen. Erhebt das Imperium den Tribut nicht exakt aus diesem Grund? Damit die Menschheit überleben und Wohlstand erlangen kann?"

languages.text: « Les Étendues sont en danger, c'est pourquoi je veux me servir de la dîme pour protéger tout le secteur. Ce tribut que prélève l'Imperium n'a-t-il pas pour but précis d'assurer la survie de l'humanité et lui permettre d'avancer vers la prospérité ? »
languages.original_text: "The Expanse is in danger. I want to use the tithe to protect the entire sector. Does the Imperium not exact tribute precisely so that Humanity may survive and advance toward prosperity?"

traits.locale_text: « Les Étendues sont en danger, c'est pourquoi je veux me servir de la dîme pour protéger tout le secteur. Ce tribut que prélève l'Imperium n'a-t-il pas pour but précis d'assurer la survie de l'humanité et lui permettre d'avancer vers la prospérité ? »

languages.text: “整个科罗努斯扩区处于危险之中，我打算用什一税资源保护整个星区。帝国之所以征收什一税，不就是为了让人类生存下去、繁衍生息吗？”
languages.original_text: "The Expanse is in danger. I want to use the tithe to protect the entire sector. Does the Imperium not exact tribute precisely so that Humanity may survive and advance toward prosperity?"

traits.locale_text: “整个科罗努斯扩区处于危险之中，我打算用什一税资源保护整个星区。帝国之所以征收什一税，不就是为了让人类生存下去、繁衍生息吗？”

languages.text: «La Extensión está en peligro. Quiero usar el diezmo para proteger todo el sector. ¿Acaso el Imperium no exige tributo para que la Humanidad sobreviva y avance hacia la prosperidad?».
languages.original_text: "The Expanse is in danger. I want to use the tithe to protect the entire sector. Does the Imperium not exact tribute precisely so that Humanity may survive and advance toward prosperity?"

traits.locale_text: «La Extensión está en peligro. Quiero usar el diezmo para proteger todo el sector. ¿Acaso el Imperium no exige tributo para que la Humanidad sobreviva y avance hacia la prosperidad?».

languages.text: 「エクスパンスは危機に瀕している。{mf|俺|私}は租税を使って星域全体を守りたい。帝国は人類が生き延び、繁栄へと進むために租税を要求しているんじゃないか？」
languages.original_text: "The Expanse is in danger. I want to use the tithe to protect the entire sector. Does the Imperium not exact tribute precisely so that Humanity may survive and advance toward prosperity?"

traits.locale_text: 「エクスパンスは危機に瀕している。{mf|俺|私}は租税を使って星域全体を守りたい。帝国は人類が生き延び、繁栄へと進むために租税を要求しているんじゃないか？」

languages.text: "Enginlik tehlikede. Aşarı tüm sektörü korumak için kullanmak istiyorum. İmparatorluk, tam da İnsanlık hayatta kalsın ve refaha erişsin diye haraç toplamıyor mu zaten?"
languages.original_text: "The Expanse is in danger. I want to use the tithe to protect the entire sector. Does the Imperium not exact tribute precisely so that Humanity may survive and advance toward prosperity?"

traits.locale_text: "Enginlik tehlikede. Aşarı tüm sektörü korumak için kullanmak istiyorum. İmparatorluk, tam da İnsanlık hayatta kalsın ve refaha erişsin diye haraç toplamıyor mu zaten?"
